title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Cartman's house, day. A minivan rocks gently on the street. Inside, the boys make their interpretations of spaceship noises. Good boys that they are, they're strapped in. They're wearing football helmets and makeshift Starfleet uniforms

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Captain Cartman reporting from Shuttlecraft Spontaneity. Approaching planet Omega Nine.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Warp drive disengaged. Landing sequence initiated.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: What kind of atmosphere are you reading on the planet surface, Jew?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I'm a Vulcan!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: All right, what kind of atmosphere are you reading, Vulcan Jew?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The atmosphere is oxygen-based, should support our breathing.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: All right, hang on. We're about to land. Okay, First Officer Stan and Engineer Kenny, you come with me on the away team. Vulcan Jew Kyle will wait here.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: No! I'm on the away team too!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It's my Mom's new minivan, so I'm the captain, Kyle!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I don't care! You're not making me wait in the van again!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Fine, Kyle! But if something goes wrong out there on the planet surface, don't hold me responsible.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The side door slides open. Cartman leads the other three out, so Kyle joins them after all.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Set phasers on stun.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Things seem pretty quiet.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yes. A little too quiet.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I am picking up carbon-based life forms in Sector C. I believe we will find a village of peaceful aliens over that ridge.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Okay, fine, I guess we'll look for- Oh no!! Look out!! It's a giant four-headed lava frog!! Shoot it!!  Oh no, it got Kyle!!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: No it doesn't.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Aw, it got Kyle and it's tearing his head off!!  Aw you guys, it looks like Kyle is done for.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: No I'm not! Goddamnit Cartman, you're not gonna kill me off again!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Agh! You see guys, this is why you don't bring Jews along on the away team: they don't play along!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Shut up about Jews, fatass! You don't know anything!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh God, here we go again.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh yeah?! I saw Mel Gibson's movie, The Passion, and Mel Gibson says, in the movie, Jews are the Devil!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: He does not!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: How do you know?! I've seen The Passion thirty-four times now, Kyle! You haven't seen it once! There's even one part where the Jews have a chance to save Jesus, and you know what they do? They let Barabbas, a serial killer, go free instead and laugh about it.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Naw uh!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Go see the movie, Kyle!!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That does it! I'm sick of you guys arguing about The Passion! I'm out of here.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Me too!)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I'm not arguing about The Passion! He's being an asshole!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You know what it is? You're scared. You're scared of the truth. You don't want that movie to show you just how bad the Jews are, and why everyone hates you.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: People don't hate the Jews!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Really? Three hundred million domestic box-office, Kyle. The top-grossing film of all time, Kyle. Those numbers don't lie. If you're not scared of The Passion then go see it. Go see it and tell me I'm wrong. Mel Gibson, Kyle. Mel Gibson.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: ...You're a stupid asshole!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Sweeet, now I can just play with myself. Pewpeww-pewww! Get back in the shuttlecraft!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, day. Mel Gibson's The Passion of The Christ is now playing. Kyle walks up to the ticket booth, stops, turns back, stops again, and steps up to the window. He gives the cashier $20

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: One please.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: This is an R-rated movie.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah, I know, but I have to-

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: But, because this is such an important film that actually depicts the selfless act of Jesus Christ, I'll let you in to see it.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: ...Thanks.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, inside. Kyle enters and makes his way to a seat. He watches.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hac bashtud Christo.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Et lac Hesus. Belaca veshtad.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Wa!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Haaaah!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Non. Non. Nono, non, non, WAAAAHH!!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, outside. Kyle walks outside in a daze.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: How? How could the Jews do that to Jesus?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Pretty brutal, isn't it? Kinda wanna make you change your life, huh?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Cartman's house, day. He's on the couch eating cereal

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: And now, back to Terrance and Phillip.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hey Terrance, I think I have a-

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mom! Doorbell!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Wait, before you do, pull my thumb.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mom! Answer the door!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hey Phillip, guess what?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Goddamnit, lazy-ass whore.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: What?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You were right. You were right all along. I thought you were just an asshole when you ripped on Jews, but... I didn't know, I... I didn't know.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It's okay, Kyle. It's okay. Just... say that first part again?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You were, you were right?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mmm, one more time, Kyle.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You were right.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Cartman's house, his bedroom. Cartman's on his knees

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I want to thank you for all the blessings you have brought me. You have shown me the way so many times in the past and... now you are making all my dreams come true. You give me strength when there is doubt, and I praise you for all you have done.  Only you, Mel Gibson, have had the wisdom and the courage to show the world the truth. From this day forward I will dedicate my life to making sure your film is seen by everyone. I will organize the masses so that we may do thy bidding. Hail Mel Gibson. Amen.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Stan's house. He and Kenny are in his bedroom reading a newspaper.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Look at that, dude. The Passion has made almost 400 milliion dollars at the box office now.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Goddamn.)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Everyone in the country's gonna see that movie. I guess... we have to ge see it too.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, day. No clouds around. Stan and Kenny sit inside in the middle, looking at the movie. The movie ends

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Dude. That movie sucked.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Yeah, it totally sucked!)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: How can they even call that a movie?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (I dunno)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That's bullcrap dude, let's go get our money back.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Yeah!)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, outside. A couple emerges

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Wow, I didn't realize how horrible Christ's death was.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Me neither. Oh honey, let's be good Christians from now on!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I think if more people saw The Passion they'd have faith in Jesus.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah, it really guilt-trips you into believing.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hey, we want our money back.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Huh?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That movie sucked ass. Give us back our eighteen dollars.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I can't refund your money. You sat through the whole movie.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That wasn't a movie, that was a snuff film!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Yeah!)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You can't charge people to watch a guy get tortured for two hours!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That guy happened to be Jesus, and he went through all that to pay for YOUR SINS!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We go to church to learn that stuff! We go to movies to be entertained! We weren't entertained, and we want our money back!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I'm now allowed to give you your money back after you sat through the whole movie! You'd have to take your complaint up with the film's producers.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: W-what? Mel Gibson? You're saying we have to get our money back from Mel Gibson?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah. I'd like to see you try.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh, we will! This is America! And in America, if something sucks, you're supposed to be able to get your money back! Come on, Kenny!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Kill him! Guilty! Kill him!  Kill him! Kill him! Die!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Kill Jesus! Yesss! Arrrgh!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Stan's house, day. Stan and Kenny are at Stan's computer

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Okay, search for Mel Gibson. Mel Gibson bio, Mel Gibson news, Mel Gibson... home page. Here we go.  Welcome to Mel Gibson's ThePassion.com, your source for everything Mel. Pictures, philosophy, upcoming projects. Damnit, no phone number! Oh wait! "For more information on Mel Gibson, call the Webmaster at 1-800-43.." Okay, okay, wait, here we go.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: the phone rings. Cartman answers.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mel Gibson's The Passion Fan Club.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hi, uh, my friend and I just went to see The Passion

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Uh huh, and so you want to join the fan club now. Our first meeting is at 5:30 p.m.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Nonono, no, we want our money back.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: What?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We think the movie sucked and we want Mel Gibson to give us back our eighteen dollars. Do you know how we can get in touch with him?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You thought it sucked? Sir, apparently, you don't understand what Mel Gibson was trying to do! He was trying to express, through cinema, the horror and filthiness of the common Jew. It has made people the world over open their eyes.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Look, kid, we just thought it was a bad movie, so tell us how to get in touch with Mel Gibson so we can get our money back!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: If I knew where Mel Gibson was, I'd be down on the floor licking his balls at this very moment, sir. All I know is he lives somewhere in Malibu. Now stop wasting me and Mel Gibson's time, you little wussy prick.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hey, don't take that tone with me, kid! I'll kick your ass!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Ohoh yeah?! I'd like to see you try, asshole! I'm like six feet tall!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I don't care! You sound like a little bitch to me!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Bitch?! Don't call me bitch! I'll pop your fuckin' head open!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah?! You wanna bring it, you little pussy?!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I already brought it, bitch! I brought it, set it down on the table and opened it, bitch!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Wait a minute. Cartman?!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Eup.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Come on, Kenny, we're going to Malibu!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Malibu? But how?)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We'll take the bus! Look, this isn't about the eighteen dollars ticket money anymore. This is about being able to hold bad filmmakers responsible!  This is just like when we got our money back for BASEketball!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Cartman's house, day. Cartman dons a Nazi outfit, taking care to look sharp

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Eric, sweetie, there's a bunch of people showing up in our backyard saying something about a meeting?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah Mom, I'm holding a meeting for all the people who loved The Passion as much as I did.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh, that's great, sweetie.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Tell them I'll be down shortly

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Okay, hon.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Töten sie die Juden. Wir können nicht stillstehen bis sie alle tot sind! Okay, I'm ready. I'm ready to do thy bidding, Mel Gibson.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Cartman's backyard. Some people are seated, others chat, others help themselves to chips and fingerfoods

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hello, are you folks holding this Passion meeting?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: No. Actually, we're guests as well. I'm Jack Garrett and this is my wife Elise.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hello.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I think it's so great that someone took the initiative to have a meeting like this.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh I agree. There are so many of us who are moved by The Passion. It's a perfect idea to have us organize so we can strengthen the Christian community.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: And apparently the organizer is just an eight year old boy who was touched by the film.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Leave it to a child to show us all the way, huh?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah, so I see this ad on the Internet saying if you love The Passion to come to this meeting, so here I am!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It's great that everyone came here to figure out how to use The Passion to enrich everyone's lives.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Ah hello everyone. Achtung.  My name is Eric Cartman and I'm the President of the Mel Gibson Fan Club.  Ah thank you, thank you. I'm happy to see that all of you.were affected by The Passion like I was. Now, we all know why we're here, and I believe we all what needs to be done.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We sure do.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: But, I think it's best we don't talk out loud about it until we have most of them on the trains heading to the camps.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Wha, what does that mean, sweetie?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I'm not sure, but-uh.  Folks, I just wanna interrupt for a second and say how remarkable it is that this little boy brought us all together. The Passion is causing a revolution of spirituality, and we owe Mel Gibson and this little boy our thanks.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Thank you, thank you very much. Now, in order to do what we  all know needs to be done, we are first going to need more support. I think we should all go out and take at least one other person to see The Passion.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh, what a great idea! We each make it our responsibility to convert one more person!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Heheh great! Yeah! Great idea.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yes, and then we can begin the cleansing, if you know what I mean.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We sure do!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah. All right. Woohoo!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mel's Malibu mansion, day. A rusty Beetle rolls up to the front security gate, stops, and lets out some passengers, then rolls away. Stan and Kenny remain

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Thank you.  This must be the place. Goddamn, Mel Gibson must be loaded.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yes?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh, hi, uh, my name is Stan, and this is Kenny

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Hello)

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Uh, we saw your movie, The Passion, and we didn't like it, so, can we have our money back, please?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You can't not like The Passion! I just followed the Bible! Christ died for you. Go home.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mel's mansion, inside

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Look, dude, we came a long way. We're not leaving until you give us our money.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh yeah? Well you're gonna have to find it first.  But I won't tell you where I keep my money.  You can torture me all you want, I still won't tell you!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Tor-torture you?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Ha! So you DO intend to torture me, huh?!  Well go ahead! Do your worst! You STILL won't get your ticket money back! I can take whatever you can dish out!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We don't want to torture you.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I get it, but you don't have a choice, is that it?! Well go ahead! I just sure hope you don't use those whips over there on the wall!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Dude, can we please just have the eighteen dollars back from you?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I have to use that money to build my church! I brought the fire and brimstone back to Christianity with The Passion and now I'm gonna start my own church! And do you know why?! So I can play banjo!  Jesus, oh how I love ya, how I love ya Jesus!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Dude, this guy is freakin' daffy!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: How dare you call me crazy! This means war!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: South Park Church, rectory. Fr. Maxi sits at his desk explaining things to Kyle

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: And so it was that God sent his only son down from heaven, to die for our sins.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh okay, but did God sent Jesus TO die, or did Jesus just get kind of screwed over.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: ...What is troubling you, my child?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Well, I have this friend, see? And this friend belongs to a certain, Chosen People of Israel. And it ...so happens that these chosen people killed your Lord.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Ah! You mean he's a Jew!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Right. But he can't live with the guilt anymore. Because, even if Jesus wasn't really the Son of God, he was still a nice guy. And he didn't deserve what happened to him in Mel Gibson's movie. I I can't sleep at night. I mean, my... friend can't sleep at night.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yes, The Passion is very powerful. The truth is, there's not a whole lot in the Bible about the Crucifixion. The Passion was actually done as a performance piece back in the Middle Ages to incite people against the Jews.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: But how can the Jews make it better??

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Well, if you really care about your friend's soul, then perhaps show him the way of Jesus. Remember: Christianity is about... atonement.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Wait. That's it. Atonement. Of course. I know what I have to do now. Thank you, Father.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Back at Mel's mansion, Stan and Kenny are still running from Mel, who's chasing after them in a cartoonish way. Mel passes a mirror, then gets back to it a second later

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Two days ago, I saw a vehicle that would haul that tanker You wanna get outta here? Talk to me.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mel Gibson is fucking crazy dude!  Wait! There's his wallet!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Freedom!!!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Awww crap, he's only got twenties! You got two dollars, Kenny??

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Jesus is Lord!!!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: All right, let's get the hell out of here!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: When you're a clown, nobody takes you seriously!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Outside

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Run, dude, run!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: K'plagh! K'plagh! And good evening, friends!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, day. A large cross is erected atop the Bijou sign. A crowd gathers and acclaims it

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: One month ago today, this amazing film opened in theaters. And now, we proud few gathere here as a people brought together by its message!  Fellow fans of Mel Gibson, our numbers have grown and now, together, we have the power to change the world!  Now I believe we should take to the streets and march in unwavering support of this important movie!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: What a great idea!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It'll be like a parade!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Good idea!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: And as we march for The Pasion we should also voice our support! So, when I say "Es ist Zeit für sauberen," you all chant back "Wir müssen die Juden ausrotten."

text: Oh, I think it's Aramaic. You know, like in the movie.

text: A synagogue. A service is going on, and the synagogue is full

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Shalom hak nak shalom. And now one of our fine young shlokas, Kyle Broflovski, has asked if he could speak to the congragation.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Thank you, rabbi.  In 1973, the United States officially issued an apology to the African American community for slavery. In 1956, Germany officially apologized for World War II AND the Holocaust. And now, I believe, in 2004, the Jewish community needs to apologize for the death of Jesus.

text: What?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: If we as a people choose not to believe that Jesus is the Son of God, then we can still apologize for the brutal way in which he was killed, and take our share of the responsibility for it.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh my God!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW

text: Now, now, everyone calm down. We live in a rational community, and everyone knows this is just a movie. There's no cause for alarm.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Well it looks like with these bus tickets we spend about eighty... seven dollars getting our money back from Mel Gibson. But I think it's the principle of the thing that matters.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: (Yeah. And the truth.)

text: Goddamn, that guy's crazy.  Hey dude, you've gotta speed up.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Huh?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mel Gibson is chasing after us. You've gotta go faster.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Haha, very funny, kid. Sit down and stop playing games.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: I'm not playing games. Mel Gibson is right behind you and he's gonna-

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: What the hell?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: HAAAA! K'PLAAAH!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hey! That's Mel Gibson!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah. I told you that!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Well, what the hell does he want?!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: He wouldn't give us our money back for The Passion, so we kinda took it.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You didn't like The Passion? But it shows how Christ suffered for you. Mel Gibson is a very spiritual man.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: The Bijou, night. The synagogue's congregation moves quickly down the street towards the theater

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Both you guys, stop! Please. You're gonna make people hate us more.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Can I help you?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: This movie is causing anti-Semitism! You must remove it from your theater!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That's right! Yeah! Remove your movie!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Remove it from the theater? Fat chance!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: We demand you stop showing it!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah! Yeah!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Nonono! Don't become an angry mob! The last time we did that we killed Jesus!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Juden!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: What's going on here?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: They're trying to have The Passion pulled from the theater.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: This film is anti-Semitic and it must be stopped!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Nonsense! Mel Gibson is a smart and spiritual man! There's nothing anti-Semitic about it!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It has reaffirmed all of our faith in Christ.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It's made one of our little Jewish boys want to apologize for the death of Jesus!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Well, maybe you should apologize.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That's right! What he said.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: How dare you?!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Look out!!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Give me my eighteen dollars!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Mel! Gibson!  Oh mein Savior! Mein Führer! You're actually here! Mr. Gibson, I have assembled the masses! We are ready to do thy bidding!  Have I been a good boy, Mr. Gibson?!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Hhha!  So! You boys have led me here to your secret base, huh? I guess now you're gonna start torturing me! Well! Oh, my nipples are so tender! Ddon't squeeze them anymore!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: That's... Mel Gibson?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: H-he's not... quite as eloquent as I had pictured.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah...  Well. I guess you wanna torture me now, don't you?!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Dude, what's wrong with him?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: He's kookoo, dude. He's absolutely out of his mind.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You! You would all love to torture me, wouldn't you?  Okay, fine. See what you can fit in there, I can take it!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Dude! I've been freaked out this whole time because of THAT guy's movie?

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Fine! If nobody here is man enough to torture me, then just give me my eighteen dollars!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: It's our eighteen dollars! Your movie sucked!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You can't say my movie sucked, or else you're saying Christianity sucked!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: No, dude, if you wanna be Christian, that's cool, but, you should follow what Jesus taught instead of how he got killed. Focusing on how he got killed is what people did in the Dark Ages and it ends up with really bad results.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: You know, he's right, Elise. We shouldn't focus our faith on the torture and execution of Christ.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Yeah. Lots of people got crucified in those times. We shouldn't rely on violence to inspire faith.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Aw, aw, no, come on, people, we're so close to completing my final solution!

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Oh, dude, I feel so much better about being Jewish now that I see that Mel Gibson is just a big wacko douche.

title: THE PASSION OF THE JEW
text: Woohoohoo! Woohoohoohoohoo!
